description: The Armenian Version of Revelation and Cyril of Alexandria's Scholia on the Incarnation and Epistle on Easter, by F. C. Conybeare (London, 1907), in 487 pdf pages. English translation, Classical Armenian texts, and scholarly notes. File size: 12.1 MB. Srbazan pataragamatoyts'k' hayots' [Divine Liturgy of the Armenians]

is_part_of.title: Online Armenian Catalogs, Philosophical, Patristic, and Theological Materials

title: The Armenian Version of Revelation
